item.title: Tory add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Tory add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Most people are other people. Their thoughts are someone else's opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tory add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tory add a quote by mahatma gandhi
item.description: "I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet." -- mahatma gandhi

item.title: Tory add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "In a good bookroom you feel in some mysterious way that you are absorbing the wisdom contained in all the books through your skin, without even opening them." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Tory add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The easy confidence with which I know another man's religion is folly teaches me to suspect that my own is also." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Tory add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Don't part with your illusions. When they are gone you may still exist, but you have ceased to live." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Tory add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Tory add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "How vain it is to sit down to write when you have not stood up to live." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Tory add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Tory add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "People love a happy ending. So every episode, I will explain once again that I don't like people. And then Mal will shoot someone. Someone we like. And their puppy." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Tory add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Poetry is an act of peace. Peace goes into the making of a poet as flour goes into the making of bread." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Tory add a quote by Vincent Van Gogh
item.description: "I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things." -- Vincent Van Gogh

item.title: Tory add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "The absurd is the essential concept and the first truth." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Tory add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "The urge to destroy is also a creative urge." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Tory add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "In the spring, at the end of the day, you should smell like dirt." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Tory add a quote by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
item.description: "The music is not in the notes, but in the silence between." -- Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

item.title: Tory add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "A thing is not necessarily true because a man dies for it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tory add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tory add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "America is the only country that went from barbarism to decadence without civilization in between." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tory add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Nowadays most people die of a sort of creeping common sense, and discover when it is too late that the only things one never regrets are one's mistakes." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tory add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Never forget that everything Hitler did in Germany was legal." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Tory add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Life is pure adventure, and the sooner we realize that, the quicker we will be able to treat life as art." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Tory add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Those are my principles, and if you don't like them...well I have others." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Tory add a quote by Niels Bohr
item.description: "No, no, you're not thinking; you're just being logical." -- Niels Bohr

item.title: Tory add a quote by Niels Bohr
item.description: "The opposite of a correct statement is a false statement. But the opposite of a profound truth may well be another profound truth." -- Niels Bohr

item.title: Tory add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Tory add a quote by Thomas Merton
item.description: "Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time." -- Thomas Merton

item.title: Tory add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "The world, we are told, was made especially for man â€” a presumption not supported by all the facts." -- John Muir

item.title: Tory add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "The world is big and I want to have a good look at it before it gets dark." -- John Muir
